text: "Sharp Dressed Man" is a 1983 song by ZZ Top. It is the second single from their eighth studio album Eliminator. It went to number 56 in the United States, number 22 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 8 in Sweden, number 15 in Belgian and number 66 in Australia. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Nickelback songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Synth-pop songs
title: Sharp Dressed Man
